game_data:
\\\Original Edited Items\\
A common construction material, used in most starter structures.
A crop used to make bread and feed livestock.
The local pigs are hardy, versitile creatures. Good for eating and as beasts of burden.
Wood is harvested from trees, and is useful for building advanced structures and a majority of weapons.
Copper is used for starter weapons.
Limestone is used in a majority of advanced structures and allows Statue construction.
Tin is a rare metal, essential for producing bronze.
Bronze is harder and more durable than copper, making much better weapons.
Meat is an important food scource other than bread. Who even eats raw wheat?
Raw cotton plants produce raw cotton. Essential for clothing.
Baked wheat, a staple food for your people. The only vegetarian food scource.
An alcoholic drink brewed from wheat, a common drink among higher end citizens but a luxury for the lower end citizens.
A need for most higher end citizens, but luxurious for the lower ends.
Coal is a dark rock that can burns hotly. It is extremely valuble as it is used iin a majority of recipes. Charcoal is also classified as coal
Copper ore can be smelted into copper inggots, a useful metal for starter tools.
Tin ore can be smelted into tin inggots. Tin can be used to make bronze for more advanced weapons.
Copper tools are a significant improvement over sticks and sharp rocks.
Bronze tools are sharp and durable, excellent for many jobs.
Royal Decrees are documents carrying the will of the king, conveying his authority to even distant cities.
Worms are mainly used for raising chickens. Though, most are found in the bodies of the already rotting Deads.
Chickens are a cheap source of meat. Providing a cheaper substitute to pigs. Locals are allowed to raise their own chickens.
Basic furniture are used for the lower end citizens. Mostly out of wood.
Fine furniture are used for the Higher end citizens. Most are made with stone and a variety of materials.
\\\\\Orer Major Items\\\\\
Iron, used for cheaper weapons or for smelting steel.
Raw gold is useless right now, but used to make pure gold.
Essence used for much better trained units. It's also used to keep the Undead in one peice.
\\\Swordrath\\\
Starter weapons for earlier military, these would suffice for basic defense and militia.
Better than wood swords, these will do good for the meantime.
Better than wood swords, these will do good for the meantime.
Cheaper than steel, but weaker. I don't even know why you even bother
The best weapon in the Swordrath arsenal. Now these blades can "SEVERE LIMBS MERE SIGHT"
\\\Archidon\\\
Basic arrows made of wood. An Archidon's traditional weapon.
